thread.title: Adele returns - and these singers should, too
thread.title_full: Adele returns - and these singers should, too

author: Joey Guerra, Houston Chronicle
title: Adele returns - and these singers should, too
text: Last album: "Forever" in 2000 The one we've all been waiting for. It has to happen. Spice Girls Last album: "Forever" in 2000 The one we've all been waiting for. It has to happen. Photo: Fiona Hanson, AP Shania Twain Last album: "Up!" in 2002 She's selling out in Vegas and on tour, but the country-pop queen would make us happy with another proper album full of exclamatory hooks. Shania Twain Last album: "Up!" in 2002 She's selling out in Vegas and on tour, but the country-pop queen would make us happy with another proper album full of exclamatory hooks. Photo: Bravo, NBCU Photo Bank Via Getty Images Image 4 of 30 The Dixie Chicks Last album: "Taking the Long Way" in 2006 Emily Robison, Natalie Maines and Martie Maguire have been back on the road for awhile. Is a new album from the Texas trio inevitable? We hope so. The Dixie Chicks Last album: "Taking the Long Way" in 2006 Emily Robison, Natalie Maines and Martie Maguire have been back on the road for awhile. Is a new album from the Texas trio inevitable? We hope so. Photo: REED SAXON, ASSOCIATED PRESS Image 5 of 30 Last album: "Trial by Fire" in 1996 The Journey frontman has one of rock's greatest voices. A comeback would be huge. Steve Perry Last album: "Trial by Fire" in 1996 The Journey frontman has one of rock's greatest voices. A comeback would be huge. Image 6 of 30 Debbie Gibson Last album: "Colored Lights" in 2003 No one did pop quite like this teen idol. Her recent collaboration with Big Black Delta , "RCVR," points to a promising new sound. DO IT DEBBIE. Debbie Gibson Last album: "Colored Lights" in 2003 No one did pop quite like this teen idol. Her recent collaboration with Big Black Delta , "RCVR," points to a promising new sound. DO IT DEBBIE. Photo: Ebet Roberts, Redferns Tiffany Last album: "Rose Tattoo" in 2011 Tiffany made some interesting music with dance producers in 2005. She's since gone more folksy. It's time to dust off and dance again. Tiffany Last album: "Rose Tattoo" in 2011 Tiffany made some interesting music with dance producers in 2005. She's since gone more folksy. It's time to dust off and dance again. Photo: MBR, KRT Lindsay Lohan Last album: "Bossy" single in 2008 Don't lie: "Rumors" and "Bossy" were the jams. LiLo is featured on a new Duran Duran song , and we'd be down to hear more. Lindsay Lohan Last album: "Bossy" single in 2008 Don't lie: "Rumors" and "Bossy" were the jams. LiLo is featured on a new Duran Duran song , and we'd be down to hear more. Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Images Image 9 of 30 Gloria Estefan Last album: "The Standards" in 2013 It's time for her to get back to the Latin-flavored dance-pop that made her an influential superstar. Gloria Estefan Last album: "The Standards" in 2013 It's time for her to get back to the Latin-flavored dance-pop that made her an influential superstar. Photo: Courtesy Of Estefan Enterprises Image 10 of 30 En Vogue Last album: "Soul Flower" in 2004 Lawsuits, lineup changes and a Lifetime movie. Get it together, ladies, and free your minds. You were once untouchable. En Vogue Last album: "Soul Flower" in 2004 Lawsuits, lineup changes and a Lifetime movie. Get it together, ladies, and free your minds. You were once untouchable. Photo: Oakland Art And Soul Festival Image 11 of 30
